name: Define preferred locator hierarchy
scenario: Positive scenario to verify that the preferred locator hierarchy is defined correctly for airline UI elements.
label: UI_Validation
test_steps: 1. Access the airline UI locator configuration. 2. Review the defined locator hierarchy. 3. Verify that the hierarchy follows the preferred structure as per the guidelines.
expected_result: The preferred locator hierarchy is defined and follows the specified guidelines.

name: Update 5 UI elements with new locators
scenario: Positive scenario to verify that at least 5 airline UI elements are updated with new locators as per the defined hierarchy.
label: UI_Validation
test_steps: 1. Access the airline UI. 2. Identify at least 5 UI elements that require locator updates. 3. Update the locators for these elements according to the preferred hierarchy. 4. Save the changes. 5. Verify that the locators have been updated successfully.
expected_result: At least 5 UI elements are updated with new locators as per the defined hierarchy.

name: Share locator rules document with team
scenario: Positive scenario to verify that the document detailing the locator rules is shared with the team.
label: UI_Validation
test_steps: 1. Prepare the document detailing the locator rules. 2. Share the document with the team via the designated communication channel. 3. Confirm receipt of the document by team members.
expected_result: The document detailing the locator rules is shared with the team and confirmed received by team members.
